ch.epfl.lis.gnw
Class GeneNetwork

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.networks.Structure
      ch.epfl.lis.imod.ImodNetwork
          ch.epfl.lis.gnw.GeneNetwork

public class GeneNetwork
extends ch.epfl.lis.imod.ImodNetwork

This class represents a gene network. It extends ImodNetwork, thus it contains all the genes and the edges. Furthermore, it implements the state (gene and protein expression levels) and functions to compute the production rates and to load and save the network in SBML format.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com), Daniel Marbach (firstname.name@gmail.com)

computeDxydt

public void computeDxydt(double[] xy,
                         double[] dxydt)
Compute the rate of change of all state variables x (and y if translation is modelled). The result is returned concatenated into one array [dxdt dydt].

Parameters:
xy - Used to set the gene expressions x and protein concentrations y (if translation)
dxydt - Variations of x and y (output)

load

public void load(java.net.URL filename,
                 int format)
          throws java.io.IOException
Load a gene network from an SBML file. Overrides Structure.load(). Format must be equal GeneNetwork.SBML. Note, the SBML file must be in the exact same format as the SBML files produced by writeSBML(). In particular, we assume that reactions are listed *ordered* as we do in writeSBML().

Overrides:
load in class ch.epfl.lis.networks.Structure
Parameters:
filename - URL to the file describing the network to load
format - File format (GML, DOT, etc.)
Throws:
java.io.IOException

setEdgeTypesAccordingToDynamicalModel

public void setEdgeTypesAccordingToDynamicalModel()
Set the type (enhancing, inhibiting, dual, or unknown) of all edges according to the dynamically model.

computeMRnaProductionRates

public void computeMRnaProductionRates(double[] productionRates)
Compute the production rate for all the genes. This function is identical to the one below, except that the argument is passed as double[] instead of DoubleMatrix1d. We need both because the SDE implementation works with DoubleMatrix1d and the ODE implementation works with arrays. NOTE: x_ must be set before calling this function.

Parameters:
productionRates - Return the production rates of all the genes

computeMRnaProductionRates

public void computeMRnaProductionRates(cern.colt.matrix.DoubleMatrix1D productionRates)
Compute the production rate for all the genes. This function is identical to the one above, except that the argument is passed as DoubleMatrix1d instead of double[]. We need both because the SDE implementation works with DoubleMatrix1d and the ODE implementation works with arrays. NOTE: x_ must be set before calling this function.

Parameters:
productionRates - Return the production rates of all the genes
